input.sentences: a palish green pumpkin overlooks our favorite island .
now this pumpkin moves away from the edge of the water and joins an orange and a greener pumpkin .
the orange pumpkin rolls away and rests by a pole .
now the pumpkin jumps in to the arms of a statue !
the pumpkins reunite to overlook some scenery .
output.sentences: Today I did a photo shoot with a pumpkin that was palish with a sea overlook.
These orange pumpkins are arranged beautifully.
I set this pumpkin to rest hopefully it doesn't roll off.
I got creative and put a pumpkin on the statue.
I finally reunited the pumpkins with a beautiful scenery.
